body_html:
Hi, @utke1 . I changed the Dockerfile to install git 2.9 and git 2.19. But I still got a similar error message as follows.

Step 9/12 : RUN git submodule update --init
 ---> Running in 673898e16516
fatal: not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
The command '/bin/sh -c git submodule update --init' returned a non-zero code: 128

It would be great if you could give me some advice.

body:
Hi, @utke1 . I changed the Dockerfile to install git 2.9 and git 2.19. But I still got a similar error message as follows. 

```
Step 9/12 : RUN git submodule update --init
 ---> Running in 673898e16516
fatal: not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
The command '/bin/sh -c git submodule update --init' returned a non-zero code: 128
```

It would be great if you could give me some advice.
